summary: A stunt driver becomes attracted to his neighbor and is drawn into a dangerous underworld.

reviews.content:
The acting 10/10 
The CJI 10/10
The plot 10/10 
All around a fantastic movie I love this movie so much
I only enjoyed this movie because I was drunk, but it's still gas, get some homie's together and have a laugh at this clusterf*ck
Everyone knows if the movie was very good, great. And all credit goes to Sushant Singh Rajput for making this movie better.
I think this is one of greatest thriller movie that i have seen in Bollywood

Come on man!
The start was so bad I couldn't watch any more!
The editing isn't cohesive ! If you're going to make cuts like that maybe just do music videos.

Also, a tip for your next film. Make the opening shots actually about the character that we will follow. That way we'll know who to follow after that, even if the editing gets a bit frantic. Also, don't stay on shots too long. Like a girl getting out of a car... from many angles... once again... thats music video. Not necessary in film making. 

best of luck next time!!!

One more note. I wish Netflix would bring back the rating system. 
I want to be warned before I start to watch anything bad next time!
I think business wise, there's an opportunity for other services to overtake Netflix, if they use a good ratings system.
Just by seeing poster dont want to c this ROTTEN MOVIE

Stale love story that comes with half baked heist story, and rotten CGI created Need for Speed (albeit cheap and totally slow) car race, does it deserve my respect? No! Did it deserve my time? definitely no!
'Drive' is quite possibly the worst heist drama Bollywood has ever released, thanks to its under-par story-line wrapped in awful VFX.
Badest movie ever.....what we can expect from Karan Johar a trash. Seeing this sh*t  is like better than seeing thugs of Hindustan ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ at least their acting is strong rather than story...

2 hours of my life that I will never get back. Did they divide the movie into multiple directors who didn't talk to each other?
Also, I'm pretty sure the CGI was done by high school kids. It is so bad.

This movie was delayed a lot and I felt the reason behind releasing it directly to Netflix and not in theatres. It was dumb with no storyline whatsoever and an extremely bad CGI that looked like 90s video games, added a cherry to the cake.

I would heavily recommend not to see this movie in your lifetime.

I am giving my best that I can give to this movie 0.5/5
it's bad i mean all the actors tired their best but the story is very bad . if it had been released in theatres it would have been a super duper flop.
